title: Inside Europe 01.09.2022
description: The EU makes it harder for Russians to get travel visas, will Russians ever forgive Mikhail Gorbachev for the collapse of the Soviet Union? Also: Ukraine prints money to pay its soldiers, Bulgarians struggle with soaring energy prices and the victims of the 2016 Nice attack could soon see justice.
itunes:author: DW.COM | Deutsche Welle
itunes:keywords: Ukraine war, Ukraine economy, Russians in Turkey, Russian expatriates, EU visa rules, Bulgaria, energy crisis, Mikhail Gorbachev, fall of Soviet Union, Essen, European Green Capital, Nice attack
